body.p: WebHelpcommand lineexternal processoutside oxygen plugin allows you to use a command line interface script to obtain WebHelp output from DITA and DocBook documents. Note that the plugin is a standalone product with its own licensing terms and cannot be used with a license.
The WebHelp output files created with the plugin are the same as the output files produced when you run DITA or DocBook to WebHelp transformation scenarios from within .

When an automated process is required due to the amount of output needed, do the following:
Install the plugin
Acquire a license from http://www.oxygenxml.com/buy_webhelp.html
